docs.title: Articles

docs.text: Complete Enrollment How to complete a Checklist Enrollment Requirements Logged In One of the following: Imported Checklist Created Enrollment Steps Once successfully logged in, click on "Enrollments" to access your team's enrollments. To access the "Enrollment for Pastor" enrollment, click on its name. To complete the enrollment items, click on "Enrollment Items. Fill the respective fields with the necessary data Enter date and then click "Next" Check the checkbox and then click "Next" Enter name of program and then click "Next"
docs.title: How to Complete an Enrollment
How to complete a Checklist Enrollment

docs.text: Logged In One of the following: Imported Checklist Created Enrollment
docs.title: Requirements

docs.text: Once successfully logged in, click on "Enrollments" to access your team's enrollments. To access the "Enrollment for Pastor" enrollment, click on its name. To complete the enrollment items, click on "Enrollment Items. Fill the respective fields with the necessary data Enter date and then click "Next" Check the checkbox and then click "Next" Enter name of program and then click "Next"
docs.title: Steps

docs.text: Create Enrollment How to create an enrollment for an existing checklist Requirements Sign Up Log In Import Checklist Create Checklist Steps Once successfully logged in, click on "Checklists" to access your team's checklists. To access the "Sabbatical Application" checklist, click on its name. To create an enrollment click on "Create Enrollment". To enroll yourself, you must first fill out the "Detail" form, only the Enrollment Name is required. Click "Save" to complete enrollment. To see the newly created enrollment, click on "Enrollments".
docs.title: How to Create an Enrollment
How to create an enrollment for an existing checklist

docs.text: Sign Up Log In Import Checklist Create Checklist
docs.title: Requirements

docs.text: Once successfully logged in, click on "Checklists" to access your team's checklists. To access the "Sabbatical Application" checklist, click on its name. To create an enrollment click on "Create Enrollment". To enroll yourself, you must first fill out the "Detail" form, only the Enrollment Name is required. Click "Save" to complete enrollment. To see the newly created enrollment, click on "Enrollments".
docs.title: Steps

docs.text: Import Checklist How to import a checkology.io Requirements Logged In Steps Once successfully logged in, click on "Community" to access the checkology.ios. To access the "Sabbatical Application" checklist, click on its name. To import the checklist, click on it "Import Checklist" Confirm importing the checklist by clicking on "Import" Once successfully imported, you will see the following screen.
docs.title: How to Import a Checklist

docs.text: Once successfully logged in, click on "Community" to access the checkology.ios. To access the "Sabbatical Application" checklist, click on its name. To import the checklist, click on it "Import Checklist" Confirm importing the checklist by clicking on "Import" Once successfully imported, you will see the following screen.
docs.title: Steps

docs.text: Log In How to log into checkology.io Requirements Steps Go to https://checkology.io/login to access the login screen Enter your user credentials and click on "Log In". You may click on "Remember Me" to save your credentials. Once successfully logged in, you will see the following screen.
docs.title: How to Log In

docs.text: Go to https://checkology.io/login to access the login screen Enter your user credentials and click on "Log In". You may click on "Remember Me" to save your credentials. Once successfully logged in, you will see the following screen.
docs.title: Steps

docs.text: Sign Up How to sign up Steps Go to checkology.io/register Enter your name, email and password. Password must be at least eight characters long Click on "I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy" and click "Register" Congratulations and welcome to checkology.io! You will now see the Dashboard
docs.title: How to Sign Up

docs.text: Go to checkology.io/register Enter your name, email and password. Password must be at least eight characters long Click on "I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy" and click "Register" Congratulations and welcome to checkology.io! You will now see the Dashboard
